body: Pretty bad English. Like the key words are all there so the TL probably knows Japanese but isn't proficient in English.
Looks like Rimuru Tempest which is a plus

Couldnt understand even after reading twice, and just looked up and read the original japanese text. Holy shit this is some next level shit translation. How fucking hard is it to translate 10 basic sentences??? Doesnt seem to be a machine translation either google translation would do way better job 0/10 just learn some basic japanese and read the original instead this is aint it
